channel.title: 2015-10-02 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2015-10-02 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 02 Oct 2015 00:00
item.description: One of most exhilarating (and wet) runs so far. The night run with pitch dark trails and just Joaquin for company made this one unforgettable experience.  Reminded me of the Katrabai Pass hike back in India.  The Ragnar Appalachians still remains unchecked!
item.content:encoded: One of most exhilarating (and wet) runs so far. The night run with pitch dark trails and just Joaquin for company made this one unforgettable experience.  Reminded me of the Katrabai Pass hike back in India.  The Ragnar Appalachians still remains unchecked!
